# Main lesson


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(wosr)
```

```{r}
sid <- auth(username=NULL, password=NULL)
```

```{r}
query <- 'TS = ("animal welfare") AND PY = (2002-2003)'
```

```{r, eval=T, cache=TRUE}
query_wos(query, sid = sid)
```


```{r}
democracy<-pull_wos(query, sid=sid)
```
